short_summary: Department of National Defence wants to buy anti-G flying suits from 1 supplier for 1 year
description: A notice from the department of national defence indicating they intend to award a contract for anti-G flying suits to suppliers. Suppliers who fully meet the requirements may submit a statement of capabilities
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
- **Title / Titre**
  - English: Anti-G trousers ACAN
  - French: Pantalons Anti-G PAC
- **Government Tender Reference / Numéro de réference**
  - Reference Number: WS4296299626-Doc4478133329
  - Amendment Number: 0
- **Solicitation / Sollicitation**
  - Solicitation Number: WS4296299626
- **Publication / Publication Dates**
  - Publication Date: 2024-03-07
  - Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-22T14:00:00
- **Contract Overview / Contrat**
  - The Department of National Defence has a requirement for specialized flight clothing accessories, specifically Anti-G trousers (MSF830) for the CF-18 Hornet aircrew. This order aims to replenish stock and meet the CF-188 ELE's requirements for the next year, with the intention to be DND's last purchase of this product.
- **Statement of Capabilities / Énoncé de Capacités**
  Suppliers interested in participating are encouraged to submit a statement of capabilities outlining their qualifications and capabilities to meet the contract's requirements. Statements should be provided in writing to the Contracting Authority on or before the tender closing date.
- **Notice Details / Informations on l’avis**
  - Contracting Entity / Entité Contractante: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - Tender Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19020371?extsite=MTkwMjAzNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19020371?extsite=MTkwMjAzNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
- **Contact Information / Informations en Contact**
  For further information, please contact:
  - Contracting Authority / Autorité Des Contractant : Manon Swanson (SPAC/PSPC) ([manon.swanson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:manon.swanson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gcca))
